Wikipedia contains 5,690,369 pages.
There are a total of 442,200,007 links between Wikipedia pages.
8,355,431 Wikipedia pages are actually just redirects to other pages.
"List of current U.S. state legislators" is the Wikipedia page with the highest number of outgoing links (9,858).
"List of people from Illinois" is the Wikipedia page with the second highest number of outgoing links (8,072).
"List of least concern birds" is the Wikipedia page with the third highest number of outgoing links (7,898).
"List of stage names" is the Wikipedia page with the fourth highest number of outgoing links (6,497).
"List of birds of the world" is the Wikipedia page with the fifth highest number of outgoing links (6,288).
"Geographic coordinate system" is the most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,065,965 incoming links).
"International Standard Book Number" is the second most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,013,116 incoming links).
"Virtual International Authority File" is the third most linked to page on Wikipedia (502,230 incoming links).
"United States" is the fourth most linked to page on Wikipedia (478,291 incoming links).
"International Standard Name Identifier" is the fifth most linked to page on Wikipedia (391,251 incoming links).

The last Wikipedia page title in alphabetical order is "ùïä".
464 Wikipedia pages (0.008% of all pages) have no incoming or outgoing links.
There are only 1,550 Wikipedia pages (0.03% of all pages) which link to no other pages.
There are 298,788 Wikipedia pages (5.25% of all pages) which are not linked to from any other page.

The "List of lists of lists" page is a list of pages that are lists of list pages on the English Wikipedia.
